meanings.definition: Any of a group of organic compounds that are essential for normal growth and nutrition and are required in small quantities in the diet because they cannot be synthesized by the body.
meanings.sent1: Vitamines are important for our health and growth.
meanings.sent2: I make sure to eat foods rich in vitamines every day.
meanings.sent3: The salad was so full of vitamines that it practically glowed with healthiness.
meanings.sent4: Her smile was like a burst of vitamines, spreading joy to everyone around.
meanings.sent5: In the story, the hero's strength came from a magical potion filled with vitamines.
